member.name: T:iSpeech.TTSResult
member.summary: Contains the audio length and the stream

member.name: M:iSpeech.TTSResult.getAudioFileLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the audio file
member.returns: Length in bytes as a long

member.name: M:iSpeech.TTSResult.getStream
member.summary: Audio Stream

member.name: T:iSpeech.iSpeechSynthesis
member.summary: Contains methods used to synthesize speech from text. You can get a reference of this class by calling SpeechSynthesis.getInstance. An API key is required to use this class. You may obtain a free key from the following URL: http://www.ispeech.org/

member.name: M:iSpeech.iSpeechSynthesis.setVoice(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the voice to the specified variable.
member.param: Visit the iSpeech Developers center at http://www.ispeech.org or contact sales@ispeech.org to obtain a list of valid voices enabled for your account.

member.name: M:iSpeech.iSpeechSynthesis.setOptionalCommands(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Specify additional parameters to send to the server.

member.name: M:iSpeech.iSpeechSynthesis.clearOptionalCommands
member.summary: Clears any associated optional parameters.

member.name: M:iSpeech.iSpeechSynthesis.speak(System.String)
member.summary: Converts text to speech.
member.param: The text to convert into audio.

member.name: T:iSpeech.StreamingBuffer
member.summary: Used to write your audio data to

member.name: M:iSpeech.StreamingBuffer.Flush
member.summary: Flushes the stream

member.name: M:iSpeech.StreamingBuffer.WriteByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a single byte to the stream

member.name: M:iSpeech.StreamingBuffer.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a buffer to the stream

member.name: T:iSpeech.SpeechResult
member.summary: Contains the text and the confidence rating for the conversion, which is a float 0.0 to 1.0

member.name: F:iSpeech.SpeechResult.Text
member.summary: The recognized text or null if recognition was unsuccessful.

member.name: F:iSpeech.SpeechResult.Confidence
member.summary: The confidence level of the recognition. 1.0 is equivalent to 100% accuracy.

member.name: T:iSpeech.ApiException
member.summary: An API Exception

member.name: T:iSpeech.SpeechRecognizerEvent
member.summary: Used to notify when the recording state changes

member.name: F:iSpeech.SpeechRecognizerEvent.RECORDING_COMMITTED
member.summary: Fired when audio recording has been committed. No new audio will be recorded after you receive this event.

member.name: F:iSpeech.SpeechRecognizerEvent.RECORDING_CANCELED
member.summary: Fired when audio recording has been canceled. A user can cancel recording by pressing the red cancel button.

member.name: F:iSpeech.SpeechRecognizerEvent.RECORDING_ERROR
member.summary: Fired when an error occurred. lastException will contain error details (if available)

member.name: M:iSpeech.SpeechRecognizerEvent.stateChanged(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Exception)
member.summary: Used to notify when the audio recorder state changes.
member.param: One of RECORDING_COMPLETE, RECORDING_COMMITTED or RECORDING_CANCELED
The value provided to the{@link SpeechRecognizer.setFreeForm} method
The last exception that occurred (if any)

member.name: T:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer
member.summary: Contains methods to recognize spoken audio and convert free form speech into text.

member.name: F:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_DISABLED
member.summary: Disable free form speech recognition.

member.name: F:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_SMS
member.summary: A SMS or TXT message.

member.name: F:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_VOICEMAIL
member.summary: A voice mail transcription

member.name: F:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_DICTATION
member.summary: Free form dictation, such as a written document

member.name: F:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_MESSAGE
member.summary: A message addressed to another person.

member.name: F:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_INSTANT_MESSAGE
member.summary: A message for an instant message client

member.name: F:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_TRANSCRIPT
member.summary: General transcription

member.name: F:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_MEMO
member.summary: A memo or a list of items

member.name: M:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.startStreamingRecognize(System.String,iSpeech.SpeechRecognizerEvent)
member.summary: Starts the ASR connection
member.param: The mime type of the audio data
A SpeechRecognizerEvent to receive status updates and messages.
member.returns: A stream that you will write audio data to.

member.name: M:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.cancelRecord
member.summary: Cancels a recording in progress and dismisses the current prompt if one is visible.

member.name: M:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.stopStreaming
member.summary: Stops the recording process and returns a {@link SpeechResult}.
member.returns: {@link SpeechResult} with the text string of the audio and a float containing the estimated confidence.

member.name: M:iSpeech.iSpeechRecognizer.setFreeForm(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set to free form recognition. Will not use any command or alias list. Your API key must be provisioned to use this feature. One of the SpeechRecognizer.FREEFORM_ values. Most developer accounts can use FREEFORM_DICTATION as a parameter.

members.member:
Specify additional parameters to send to the server.
Specify additional parameters to send to the server.
Clears any associated meta and optional parameters.

member.summary: Clears all commands and aliases from this {@link SpeechRecognizer} object.

member.param: An array containing your command phrases

member.summary: Set the speech recognition language.

member.name: T:iSpeech.InvalidApiKeyException
member.summary: Generated when the API key used in the transaction is invalid.
